reviews.review_text: Take months to work when growing from the follicle. So you won't see anything for at a minimum of three months for new growth. Then the time it takes to grow longer on top of that. So you have to stay with it for months. Worst of all if you stop using it all those months of regrowing stop and you lose it all again. So to keep it there you literally have to use it for life or you're just wasting time and money.

reviews.title: Much better than the ointment
reviews.review_text: No more scalp scabs that were caused by the ointment, which I could only use once a day to minimize the scabs. The foam now allows me to use it twice a day as recommended. Also, no more very messy oil residues because the foam now dries quickly in your hair. I had stopped the ointment, but then my hair began to fall out 2 months later, so this means the ointment at 1X a day was actually working so now 2X daily with the foam should be much more effective.

reviews.title: Please make sure you stock the shelf properly
reviews.review_text: The only dislike is that I had to order it online because it wasn't on the shelf. The space was filled with a similar product, but the wrong product. For days I returned to see the shelf was not filled with this product because another foam made by Rogaine was in its place, so I assume the stockers assume its full and put the rest in top stock or something.

reviews.title: It works for hair loss
reviews.review_text: Family history of androgenetic alopecia. I have used this product several times in the past and had great results maintaining what I had plus new hair growth. However, if you stop using using the product, your new hair growth will fall out over time. Use shampoos and conditioners without sulfates or parabens, which hampers regrowth and clogs hair follicles.
Fair price and one of the few places that offers this product. I have used it for years and it is a high quality product compared to other resellers I have tried.

reviews.title: Works to stop hair loss
reviews.review_text: Minoxidil works, it takes time though! I'm a woman with thin hair and I saw a difference after 2 months and a half. It won't grow your hair back but it will stop hair from falling. The only reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is because it dries out the scalp and can cause dandruff due to the alcohol in the formulation. This is a small con in exchange for the ease of use of the liquid version though. If you want to avoid the dandruff and don't care much about taking a little longer when applying, the mousse version also works just as well.

The active drug is fine, but the foam itself is a little odd: you have to REALLY put some pressure on the foam to stick it to the scalp, let alone absorb into the skin... and if you're not already very bald (I'm not), your existing hair makes that nearly impossible. I'd think the liquid variety might work better in this case.

reviews.title: Doesn't foam up properly
reviews.review_text: I have used three cans of this, and it does not foam up like the brand name. I hesitated to review, thinking it was a defective can, but I am now using my third can in 6 weeks, when each is supposed to be for a month each can. The foam melts almost immediately, making it hard to properly apply, leading to a lot of waste. Now, since it is cheaper, it probably is on par with the brand name for overall cost, which lasts longer. But if I am going to use a generic brand, and it ends up costing the same and is more difficult to use, I may as well pay more for the brand name which lasts longer. Equate brands are usually great, not so in this case, it is an inferior product.
Because I haven't received it. Next day delivery was promised and now 2 days later, still no updates... I'm sure you took my money though! That was the easy part for you.. what a crock of ********!
first of all, I got it as an unwanted substitution. the aerosol device stopped working and ask the liquid is inside without a possibility to get it out. a waste of resources and money.

reviews.title: You can use this if you're a female.
reviews.review_text: I can't really say one way or another how I feel about this product as I've only been using it for one month. I have not noticed any new hair growth. I have read that it can take 3 to 6 months before minoxidil starts working. This product is not greasy as other Minoxidil liquids can be. This says on the box that this is minoxidil for men, and if you read the Instruction paper inside the box it'll say that you should not use this if you are a woman. That is complete crap. I have confirmed with my dermatologist that minoxidil 5% for men is the exact same 5% for women. It's a marketing scheme to get women to purchase minoxidil for women, but it's at a more expensive price. If you are a woman considering using minoxidil, you are completely allowed to use minoxidil for men. It's the exact same thing as minoxidil for women. Don't get scared off because of that. I can add more to my review if I start noticing hair growth in the next few months. I am really keeping my fingers crossed that this works

I've been using this for about 20 years, was bald on top and the sides. Was told by doctor to try it sometimes it will work. It works for me. Once you start using this you have to continue. It's easy to use I squirt a little on each side and the top.

reviews.title: women can use too
reviews.review_text: I did some research no reason women cannot use the mens version it's just a way for them to make more money! Now in my 40's my hair thinned out so bad on top can see my scalp so gonna use this for a few more months to see if it thickens back up again. The foam seems to be easier to apply.

reviews.title: Hope it works!
reviews.review_text: Too soon to know if it works. It's being combined with hair recovery protocol consisting of 1mg finasteride daily. Finasteride at 1 yr mark shows it stopped the hair loss. Hoping the minoxidil grows it back where there's diffuse thinning on top. The foam is much better than the liquid dropper formula. Easy to apply and it dries very fast. Doesn't make hair feel weighed down or sticky.

reviews.title: Works as it should.
reviews.review_text: Works just as well as brand name Rogaine to slow or prevent male pattern baldness. I've been using minoxidil products for more than 30 years when my hair loss first began and now and nearly age 70 I still have a decent head of hair. My brother and father were bald on top by this age.

reviews.title: Defective cans don't empty completely
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for years without any issues. This time, the cans did not empty completely. There is product left in each can, but it will not come out. Some came out as a dribble, not a foam, and some won't come out at all. I will be returning them.

reviews.title: The foam is 10x better than the liquid
reviews.review_text: The foam is a bit more expensive than the liquid formula, but it's very much worth it. It's easier to apply (FAR less messy/drippy), absorbs more quickly into the skin, and causes no irritation, dryness, or dandruff. Some people have trouble with minoxidil causing these symptoms, but it's actually the propylene glycol used as the carrier agent in the liquid formula -- the foam does not have this (which is why the foam formula was created in the first place). Spend a little more and get the foam.
I cannot properly rate this item because it will likely take months to determine if there were any positive results.

reviews.title: Thrilling result!
reviews.review_text: Recommended by my dermatologist for female hair thinning. (The men's foam aerosol, even though I am a woman). Have been using now for a year with very noticeable hair growth and thickening.... I am thrilled! No more scalp showing.
Very effective. Lost my hair due to chemo. It grew back because of this product. 70 yrs. old and I have hair. Yay!

reviews.title: Good results at a great price
reviews.review_text: I use twice daily as instructed. Minor scalp irritation at the beginning seems to have stopped completely. Hair first seemed to be falling out less, now I see some thickening.

reviews.title: I prefer Equate Drops
reviews.review_text: I prefer the Equate drops over this foam product. With foam I seem to get more on hair and less on scalp. Soooo, I will be going back to the drops that are sold in 3 month supply cartons.

reviews.title: 90% as effective as the brand name Rogaine
reviews.review_text: This is 90% as effective as the brand name Rogaine. It's a little smelly too when its aborbs into your hair. But overall its pretty effective and less expensive.

reviews.title: Finally some growth
reviews.review_text: I had bad hair loss after an illness. It started to grow back but then nothing for over a year even with my nutrition being on point. The dermatologist suggested mens minoxidil along with a hair growth vitamin. It has finally started to grow back in. The picture is after about 2.5 months. This brand is much cheaper which is great because I use it all along my hairline all the way around so a 3 month supply only lasts me a month. *minoxidil is toxic to pets and I was very upset that I was not told this initially. At night after I put it on I put my hair up and then wear a satin bonnet to bed so none gets on my pillows since my cat and chihuahua sleep with me

reviews.title: Works great for a great price!
reviews.review_text: The same ingredients as name brand for half price! This stuff works!

reviews.title: Combine with Finasterside oral and T
reviews.review_text: Combine with Finastaside and T injections. For best results for men.

reviews.title: Lots of hair
reviews.review_text: My husband loves it. He hasn't lost his hair since he started using it. Still has a lot of hair.
Works with consistent use following the instructions.
they work as well as rogaine foam at a much lower price!
Product has either increased in price or offered with smaller quantity

reviews.title: metal taste in mouth
reviews.review_text: After using this product for about 5 or 6 days I developed a metal taste in my mouth so I stopped using it. I am planning to try using it again.

reviews.title: Wonders
reviews.review_text: Be consistent for two months and you will never regret. Hair growing on my forehead where there have never been hair. I like it

reviews.title: Easier Application
reviews.review_text: This product has a much easier application than the liquid and it's less mess. Be sure to follow the directions and it's simple to use.

reviews.title: Too soon to tell
reviews.review_text: I just got it for my husband. Get back to me in a month or two, and I will tell you how the progress went. Price was good.
I have been using this for years and it is exactly the same product as the name brand but only half the price

reviews.title: Be careful
reviews.review_text: Mad matters worse. All my hair came out in the areas I applied.

reviews.title: runny as heck
reviews.review_text: this does not keep a phone consistency it ends up being very thin and runny
My husband is using this product for 7 years now. It seems working. He is not loosing his hair any longer.

reviews.title: Great alternative to the brand name product.
reviews.review_text: Works as well as Rogaine. It also does not leave your hair feeling "greasy" like some of the other generic brands that have glycerin in the foam.

reviews.title: Same As Name Brand Product
reviews.review_text: Just as good as the name brand product! I have continued to purchase it because the results are the same for half the price.

reviews.title: Recommended by three dermatologists for hair loss
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply. Shampoo, condition, towel dry. Then apply as mouse focus on putting it on your scalp. Hair can be styled and helps my hair look fuller

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: The Walmart price is awesome and the product seems to work as well as the name brand. I have been using it for years and will continue to do so
I have used this product for the past 2 months with great results. This is a high quality product and Walmart.com has the best prices. Thanks!

reviews.title: It works!
reviews.review_text: This product works as long as you're consistent. Give it 3 months before seeing results. My only concern and it maybe the bottle design, the last few ounces won't foam and it's wasted product.

reviews.title: Keep at it!
reviews.review_text: My 73-year old husband has been using it morning and night for 3 months and after 2 months it started working. The bald spot is getting smaller, and many baby hairs in the middle. Can't believe he stuck with it!

reviews.title: Very effective!
reviews.review_text: Works very well, and most importantly, my wife is happy with the improvement. It restored my hair after 5 or 6 months of daily applied morning and evening. Now I must cut my hair every 3 - 4 weeks. Equate is better priced than other products.
This product works better than the liquid form and I'm satisfied with it!
I returned the item and did not get credit for my purchase
good price, identical components to other products.

reviews.title: Buy This Product!
reviews.review_text: Fabulous, Fabulous product. Well worth the money. After heavy hair loss later in life, product was recommend by my dermatologist. After initial shedding process first couple of weeks, product stopped hair loss 95%. Very pleased to even see a bit of regrowth at four months. I'm a believer!

reviews.title: Hair Growth equivalent to Name Brand
reviews.review_text: This is the only product I use, I am a 69 year old women who has lost most of her hair on top of her head. My doctor and dermatologist both recommend this product, as I have some hair follicles and I have noticed they are starting to go. You must use this product every day, otherwise your hair reverts back to the way it was. I don't want to purchase a wig, or hair piece, I am happy with the results, it is a lot better than it was before.

This helped me start the growth of my facial hair and i am now happier than ever.
good deal. recommended. i personally like liquid better, but foam works. it is easier to apply.

I use this product regularly and it's not always available in the store but when I order it online, it always arrives next day.

reviews.title: This stuff works!
reviews.review_text: Excellent product. This actually works for me. 6 months ago I tried this and vitamins. My hair actually came BACK plus more is growing! Use this and be patient. Your hair will grow back.

reviews.title: 1 to 2 years user.
reviews.review_text: My conclusion is if you start using it at the first noticeable sign, you can possibly have a positive outcome. If it's pretty much gone, don't waste your money.

"I have been using this product for years, and I'm very satisfied with it. Unfortunately the local Sam's store stopped carrying it, so I went to the Walmart site. I was initially hesitant to order, but had no choice given that I like the product. I ordered liked 3 - 4 boxes so I could have a ""stock"" anticipating delays in getting it. NO SUCH THING! Delivery was extremely fast. I had to work through my ""stock"" but now that i""m running out and ordered again it was delivered in ONE DAY

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review_text: I save money by using the men's product. The only difference between the men's and women's is the dosage. Men's is a one month supply and the women's is a two month supply because it's only supposed to be applied once a day. I started using it about 3 years ago when my hair was beginning to get thin. I liked the old directions for use better than the ones on the new packaging. I do use it on my receding hairline as well as the back of my head. I also use the cap to measure the amount rather than putting it on a cold surface and guessing if I'm getting a 1/2 capful.

reviews.title: New growth!
reviews.review_text: Easy to use and no odor. When it dries it leaves some texture but does not make my hair greasy. I've been using it for 2 months now and I have many new baby hairs growing in. My dermatologist recommended the 5% men's formula even though I'm a woman because it's more effective

reviews.title: Meh, it is what it is
reviews.review_text: Price is cheaper than name brand. But it is still too expensive for something that barely seems to work. Name brand is same, exact same ingredients. I'm sure it works no better or no worse than name brand. I waited too late to start this, but it has helped to retain what little I have left in crown. But absolutely, no new growth ever occurred, and I've been using twice per day per instructions for years and years. Minoxidil is no miracle cure for our problem. It may make you feel not quite completely helpless about it though. But not much. The older I get, the less I care and will probably discontinue at some point. Packaging is top notch and product is EXACTLY as advertised.

Been using this for little over 2 months and i already see some result with alot of little hair. As other stated you habe to be consistence of doing it twice a day and allow the med to be fully absorb, that mean no hair wash for atleast 2hrs after using it.

I've been using Equate Minoxidil for six months and have noticed that I've been growing a lot of baby fuzz and thin hairs on the top of my head. Whether this leads to thicker hair growth only time will tell. The product is priced well below its competitors.

reviews.title: Sort of works?
reviews.review_text: It will slow down hair loss a bit, however, it tends to be gummy and flattens you hair if you add too much. But the instructions tell you ithe more you put on, the better it will work. By the way, did my research, and this has been approved for women, I've been using for a few years now. I just have to be careful not to use so much, otherwise, it makes my hair flat and sticky. Wish they could use a formula that wouldn't be sticky.

reviews.review_text: I've been using the product for over six months and have had great results

I love this product however, the foam doesnt foam after you use it. It becomes liquid after while Im not sure why other than that its great

reviews.review_text: Been using for a while very please of course nothing like ths original. Was shaving my head it so thin but now have hair in places it was almost gone.

reviews.title: It worked for me!

reviews.title: A Success!!!
reviews.review_text: I am totally shocked, it has reached my wildest expectation. I got hair on top of my head that I hadn't had in 10 years. So yes this works, family and friends are amazed, so I am going to continue to use and order this. Thanks

Drys up pretty quick and doesn't make my face ir rated highly recommend, I use it once a day with once a week derma roller and so far it see minor results I'm barely on my third week but i am exicted to see the full results

Easy to put on. I lost a lot of hair in the crown of my head during Covid. I bought this and it started working after about three weeks. Now I'm just maintaining, but definitely worth it. The men's Equate hair regrowth works better than the women's.

reviews.title: Great product, great price
reviews.review_text: I've been using this since menopause and am very satisfied. The price can't be beat and it is easy to apply. It takes a few months, maybe 6, to see results but that is due to the unsynchronized way your hair follicles grow.

reviews.title: Easier to apply the liquid than the foam, for me
reviews.review_text: Three stars because it's hard to apply to my scalp. I have medium/long hair and it feels like most of it just ends up on my hair. The liquid version was way easier to apply for me.

reviews.title: Great price
reviews.review_text: I use this for my BEARD and yes, fellas, it does work well if you stick with it. I always buy this brand because it is about half price of what the name brand costs.

reviews.title: Great stuff because it works!
reviews.review_text: Simple - It really works - I was balding rapidly on the top of my head and now I have a full head of hair - been using this product for over 5 years. It should be applied twice daily for best results - great stuff!

reviews.title: Rogaine quality at affordable price
reviews.review_text: Rogaine quality at affordable price. Love the foam more than the liquid. Highly recommended. Walmart could do better keeping it stocked in-store though. They sell out quick.

reviews.title: Great product at half the price
reviews.review_text: This is the exact same product as Rogaine, and it is half the price. I have used it for about a year and it definitely increases hair growth and decreases hair loss.

reviews.title: How is that a by mistake?
reviews.review_text: I purchased this item as a pickup. When I got home I noticed box was already open. Out of the three foam cans, one ws extremely light in weight and the cap was full of residue. This product was clearly used, returned, and resold. Beyond unsatisfied with Walmarts service. Especially when it comes to local delivery. They give you the worst produce/products possible. Would give no star if possible.

reviews.title: Equate hair foam
reviews.review_text: I love this product. The foam works best for me. I use men's foam because it's cheaper and 5 percent strength. I have experienced hair growth in places where I was thinning. Too bad my Walmart store does not carry this product any longer on its shelves. I have to special order this. I get my order quickly and am very satisfied.

reviews.title: It worked for me
reviews.review_text: I am a woman who has been dealing with hair loss since my teens, which is over 20 years ago. My hair loss got worse as the years progressed, to the point of being ready for a wig. My last ditch effort was to wait until I was done having kids (for safety's sake), and start on minoxidil. My internet research told me many women have more success with 5%, so I used it twice a day. Like others, I went through the shedding process. Since my hairloss was already so progressed, it made things even worse for about 3 months, at which point subtle regrowth began. This is a slow and steady progress, and I felt comfortable enough stop using Dermatch concealer (which I've used for over 10 years) after 10 months of use. I do occasionally use it only once a day, and haven't noticed any difference in the results. The good: It did regrow enough to my satisfaction, although it is still evident I have some level of hair loss. The bad: you have to use it for the rest of your life, and the shedding period is very frustrating. I am glad I did it, and plan to continue to use it. And the bottles say they should last about a month, but if you have typical woman hair loss like me, it needs to be spread over the majority of your head. A bottle lasts me about 2 1/2 weeks.

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.review_text: I have been balding since 18. I have tried other products such as propecia with little to no results. This is the best product so far. I have been using for 2 months and have white fuzz on my head that hasn't been there in over 10 years. Some are turning my natural hair color. Super excited! Can't wait to see the results in 4 months. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: pitiful and wastful lack of service
reviews.review_text: I placed an order and was notified that it was ready for pickup. I drove to the designated parking spot and called the designated telephone number for alerting them that was there. I had to go inside andfind a store manager because the pickup employees never answered the phone. I came close to cancelling my order. I will never go back in that Walmart Store again.

reviews.title: work well for AA women too
reviews.review_text: I've been using 2% drops for 9 months and this stuff really work BUT it doesn't increase the rate your hair grows. It's waking up the follicles that went dormant so don't EXPECT anything big the first 3 months. My newly awakened follicles put out hair but only at an 1/8 inch growth per month in my problem areas and the rest of my hair grow at normal rate of 1/2 inch a month. So, it takes awhile to get length and coverage. Months 4-6 you'll start seeing more coverage so by your 2nd-3rd box. It has definitely thickened my hair and filled in my crown to the point I don't have to use devices to cover my scalp but it's still the thinnest part of my scalp but I'm fine with having enough coverage to not be as self conscious. I'm switching to foam bcos the itching is real with the drops. If you're a woman, I read that using the 5% once daily is the same as twice daily with the 2%...

reviews.title: Awesome product
reviews.review_text: I hear it doesn't work for everyone but it's definitely working for me. I'm 25 and my hairline was receding at an alarming rate the past three years. I decided I better start fighting it or at least try to slow it down so I bought four months of this stuff. Now I'm a little over three months in and after a disheartening shed process my hair is noticeably thicker and my hairline is almost back to where it was when I was 21. I honestly didn't expect the results but after I stopped shedding it was a matter of two or three weeks when I saw a dramatic, seemingly sudden, change in my hair. I've read people combining products with this but I've just used this by itself to achieve great results this quick. For the price, it's definitely worth a shot if your considering giving it a go. I've been pretty consistent for the past few months but I have missed a few applications. I read not to stress too much about missing an application but to do your best and to wait at least 6 hours after you apply the first one. Good luck hope you get the results you want.

reviews.title: Worth the extra $10 over the liquid.
reviews.review_text: This product in foam version I think is well worth the extra $10 over the comparable 3 month supply of drops. I'd been using the minoxidil drops for about six months and yes, I noticed results, not as great as I'd hoped but overall, yes good re-growth. The results that I did see with the drops however was patchy and uneven, I don't know if I was getting all the areas or what exactly it was. I'd been looking at the foam for a while and wondered if it was worth the extra $10. The answer is YES. I got a 3 month box of the foam a little over a month ago, and I am 100% most definitely seeing certain results, such as growth overall plus new growth in the patchy areas. It's a lot more even looking now. You know the camera that is aimed at the top/back of your head in the Walmart self checkout machine? When I looked at myself in it the other day unexpectedly, I have to say I was really surprised. And pleased!
I Don't Trust Walmart the same way as I would other Businesses

reviews.title: It works (and continues to work)
reviews.review_text: Absolutely no reason to buy the more expensive name brand.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review_text: Been using for years, and this works just as well as Rogaine, which is much more expensive. Recommend to anyone looking for hair loss solution

reviews.title: works very well to help prevent thinning hair
reviews.review_text: love this product. great product and cant beat the price! works very well to help prevent thinning hair

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.review_text: This works just as well as the namebrand at a much lower price point! The foam makes it so much easier to apply! Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Perimenopause hair loss
reviews.review_text: The package came in perfect condition. So far have only used for a week but am excited to see some results soon! Can't wait to update.
Ive bought this several times now and its a quality supplement from a quality company and it seems to work, but ill update more as time goes by.
It's easy to use . It's working great I started using this on Nov. 8 and my bald spot has hair growing in. It's effective

reviews.title: horrible
reviews.review_text: I didn't receive because you ignored my instructions and now there is nobody answering phones, chats or messages.
I wanted to buy the 6-month product but it has been out-of-stock for months. So I bought the 3-month product which is more expensive per tube.

reviews.title: Highly Recommend for Thinning Hair
reviews.review_text: Love the fact that it really works. My preference is the Minoxidil Foam - no irritation on my sensitive scalp.

reviews.title: Best price and quality product
reviews.review_text: Easy spray foam, seems more gentle than the drops and works good. Used for couple years and have held onto thinning hair, and some regrowth.

reviews.title: Perfect to Keep Water out
reviews.review_text: I love how useful this is, you can use it as it comes or cut it in small pieces. I cut it in half and molded with my fingers. Don't leave residue in your hands and keep water out. Great product .

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my husband because I read other reviews and he loved it. He was using the same product from another company but this one worked a lot better.

reviews.title: Good product
reviews.review_text: I was using the liquid form and it would give me a lot of dandruff-like scabs on my head. This one has the same 5% effectiveness but it is less harsh on the scalp. It is also easier to apply than using the liquid version with its dropper.

reviews.title: Very Satisfied
reviews.review_text: Very good product %26 noticeable difference.
I've bought it before (many times), and I'm very happy.

reviews.title: Go back to the liquid form
reviews.review_text: X( The changed from liquid form to spray foam that goes everywhere and makes a mess
To be honest, it takes a while for the product to work, but so far so good.

reviews.title: Damaging
reviews.review_text: No new growth and makes hair really dry and coarse.

reviews.title: Let’s get thick
reviews.review_text: So far good. Used once. It’s foam. We shall see
Easy to apply! Works amazing! Doesn't cause scalp to itch like the solution did for me!

reviews.title: Great product at half the price!
reviews.review_text: This stuff works great! And costs half the price of the name Brand! I would highly recommend.
Have used this product before and found it a good value and effective.

reviews.title: great
reviews.review_text: great price! i had no issues and if ur consistant as directed, the product works.
It's a good product at a fair price. It's not as good as Up and Up which seems creamier

reviews.title: works Great
reviews.review_text: helps your Hair growth and your styling
Price is a bit high lately. Had to skip some months.

reviews.title: great product
reviews.review_text: great stuff- just like the name brand but significantly less expensive.

reviews.title: the foam works
reviews.review_text: the product works. no doubt. but the foam makes my hair feel like i have firm hold gel in it
Equal quality to Rogaine for a more affordable price.
Good quality. Last long. Cheaper than product I used before.
Seems to be as good as name brand for half the price.

reviews.title: Satisfied
reviews.review_text: Arrived a day early, easy to you, no mess. Haven't had long enough to see if it will work
It's still too early to tell whether anything is growing but I believe it will.

reviews.title: Husband swears by it
reviews.review_text: My hubby won't use anything else
It's hard to rate it yet, but it seems to be working so far.
Been using this h guy or years. Beautician says she can see changes.
Works excactly how it should.Better than more expensive brands

reviews.title: Results
reviews.review_text: Works for maintaining hair loss and regrowing hairs depending on how far off you are.

reviews.title: Works just as well as the name brand
reviews.review_text: Save money and get the same results.
Perfect, except diificult when first using, to snap off the clear plastic top.
It works just as well as Rogaine, yet less expensive
Have only used one dose as of yet. Generic pricing was much better than brand.

reviews.title: Very happy
reviews.review_text: I buy this regularly, I have seen very good results!

reviews.title: Good deal.
reviews.review_text: Same thing as Rogaine at a much more reasonable cost.
Quick delivery works good see more growth in thin areas
easy to use at a good price, but causes dryness on my scalp
Product said it would be here yesterday…. Still waiting. Pricing is still too high.
My thinning areas actually grew back 25-30%. I just hope it lasts. Try it.
The product is very good. Better texture and less expensive than Rogaine.
Oroduct is more reasonably priced compared to name brand types.

reviews.title: It's amazing
reviews.review_text: Extremely helps grow and maintain the current hair

reviews.title: Something, but not great regrowth.
reviews.review_text: Does what it should. Regrowth COULD be thicker tho.

reviews.title: It is a good product
reviews.review_text: It seems to be working, but it is really to new to review. According to the directions I should start seeing a difference in about 2 months. I have only been using it about a month now, but I'm actually starting to see growth. (It is very thin fuzz-like hair right now, but that is what the instructions said I should expect). I will keep reporting on this product as I use it.

reviews.title: perfect
reviews.review_text: I'm grateful to the person who wrote the review advising the foam is better than the liquid and doesn't cause the intense itching! IT WORKS- I'm using it on my front hairline to fill in spots from high ponytails

reviews.title: Sort of in the middle on this.
reviews.review_text: A little difficult to put where you want it. The dropper has a large opening and I would up applying too much. It is also very sticky and hard to style the hair after it dries. Maybe I put too much but it also left my hair looking like it was gray........have to see if it works as it has only been a week and it takes much longer to see results. That is why only 3 stars right now.

reviews.title: No positive results after using for 5 months.
reviews.review_text: No positive results after using for 5 months. In fact, it made me loss hair. Every day.
Been two weeks since I started to used to soon for my opinion
Having just bought it and never used it. I felt a good review was better than a negative one

reviews.title: Works like it should.
reviews.review_text: It works on male pattern baldness (bald spot) but not a receding hairline. Been using this for twenty years. Recommend.

reviews.title: Minoxidil for beard
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for my beard actually and I’ve noticed amazing results. It takes patience like most people say but it works and that’s what matters. I have hair in areas that I could never grow hair before. Will be buying again.

reviews.title: Equate Foam Hair Regrowth Treatment for Men 5%
reviews.review_text: As far as I can tell, this is identical to the name brand product, but at a lower price. It's only been a few days so it's too early to tell if it's doing any good, though.

reviews.title: Stuff actually works.
reviews.review_text: Less than a month in and had stubble appearing and the thinning areas looked fuller. At three months had shrunk a 3 plus inch bald spilt down to 1 inch. Do not exceed the recommended amount per use. Headaches and gummy mouth may result.

The driver delivered my items to wrong apartment but luckily I wasn't working today. The photos were a big help, drivers should pay more close attention to the customer address. I normally rate my experience at a five but today it will be a four. Thank goodness my items weren't stolen.

reviews.title: As good as Rogaine.
reviews.review_text: I've used Rogaine for 6 months now and thought I would try this since it's less money. I don't feel the Roagaine has worked, which probably means this wont work either. This is less expensive and causes no irritation (neither did Rogaine) so for the price point I'll try this for the next 6 months. As I said, I don't think I'm growing any new hair but it does make my hair look good, and thick so even as an expensive hair styling product I'll continue to use it as long as I don't see any side effects. It may be stopping further hair loss too. It does last the 3 months, I use A LOT, probably more than I should and each can lasts 1 month.

reviews.title: Works
reviews.review_text: I did not have problems with the foam. Been using it for years without an issue.

reviews.title: I won't regrow hair...unless
reviews.review_text: This stuff won't regrow your hair unless you a just beginning to lose it. But I does make what's left of my hair feel fuller and thicker.

reviews.title: online order
reviews.review_text: just received the product, delivery time was great. I had used the liquid this is the first time using the foam. I'll let you know how it works after awhile

reviews.title: Equate Minoxidil
reviews.review_text: I've not had this long enough for results yet, but heard great results from friends and relatives. Females using the mens formula cause it's stronger. I might try the liquid after this is used up cause the foam is a bit messy to work with. But if I get the results my friends did, it's worth the mess!

The foam is so much better than the liquid, but I did buy a spray bottle for the liquid. This product was recommended by my dermatologist, I have a genetic hair loss disorder, so this was an inexpensive way to try to see if I can get some hair growth back.

reviews.title: Overpriced. Buy the bottles of liquid instead.
reviews.review_text: Overpriced and not as easy to use as the bottles of liquid.

reviews.title: Good stuff
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for nearly 10 years. I do notice thicker hair. It also doubles as a great mousse.

reviews.title: Believe in science
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for 6 months… it's been hard to keep the hair contained… I have hair coming out of everywhere.

The item was not left at my door, but in the lobby by the mail boxes. Luckily, an honest neighbor saw it, noticed that it said APT 112 right in the bag, and brought it to me. Please inform and train your employees about this issue.

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.review_text: Works great. Testosterone is really the culprit of hair loss. This topical solution helps the skin retain the hair. There might even be some regrowth of lost hair when beginning use.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.review_text: Great product, easy to use, glad I found it.

reviews.title: cheaper than any other place
reviews.review_text: same thing just more cost effective

reviews.title: Good price
reviews.review_text: I like the price and that it's a 3-month supply. It's easy to apply.

reviews.title: Great Shipper
reviews.review_text: Great product for me it dose not grow hair but, it keeps my hair from falling out

reviews.review_text: I changed the address to tx more tan once it was highlighted but you are still sending to mo.

reviews.title: Same as Name Brand
reviews.review_text: Its working, I use it every day. way cheaper than name brand.

reviews.title: Definitely a good buy
reviews.review_text: Use treatment daily and you will see the results in about 10 days
It works well, but when I used it recently, severe pimples appeared on my scalp

reviews.title: Misleading advertising
reviews.review_text: Misleading Advertising This is not a 3 month supply if you are balding all over your head. More like a 1 to 1.5 month supply if that.

reviews.title: Wasteful packaging !!!!
reviews.review_text: Extremely wasteful packaging please combine all three bottles into one .

reviews.title: Hair today gone tomorrow
reviews.review_text: Have not seen a single hair grow....It has been under a month so I will be patient....

reviews.review_text: Do not want WALMart to keep credit card info on file.

reviews.title: Works great to fill in thin eyebrows
reviews.review_text: Works great. I've applied it to thin brows and they have filled in after just 3 weeks.

reviews.review_text: The value I found price comparing was why... and we'll see how well the product works next!
